description:
Tame your tent lines or quickly MacGyver a field repair on broken gear. These reusable ties come in assorted lengths and colours to help organize and mend your stuff.

  • Made of rubber-coated wire
  • 3" size contains 4 excellent ties, all other sizes contain 2 excellent ties
name: Nite Ize Gear Tie Reusable Rubber Twist-Tie
